thread.title: BRIEF-Halyard Health ‍On March 30, Court Reduced Punitive Damages Awarded Against Co To $1.3 Mln Related To Bahamas Surgery Center

title: BRIEF-Halyard Health ‍On March 30, Court Reduced Punitive Damages Awarded Against Co To $1.3 Mln Related To Bahamas Surgery Center

organizations.name: court reduced punitive damages awarded against co
reduced punitive damages awarded against co
mln related to bahamas surgery center reuters staff

text:
Market News April 2, 2018 / 11:44 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Halyard Health ‍On March 30, Court Reduced Punitive Damages Awarded Against Co To $1.3 Mln Related To Bahamas Surgery Center Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - Halyard Health: 
* ‍ON MARCH 30, COURT REDUCED PUNITIVE DAMAGES AWARDED AGAINST CO TO $1.3 MILLION RELATED TO BAHAMAS SURGERY CENTER 
* COURT ALSO REDUCED PUNITIVE DAMAGES AWARDED AGAINST KIMBERLY-CLARK CORPORATION FROM $350 MLN TO $19.4 MLN​ 
* ‍ ON MARCH 30, COURT GRANTED CO’S MOTION TO DISMISS, WITHOUT LEAVE TO AMEND, PUTATIVE CLASS ACTION FILED ON JUNE 28, 2016​ 
* SEC FILING​ Source text ( bit.ly/2Gr61nx ) Further company coverage:
